UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Inhibition and eradication activity of truncated alpha-defensin analogs against multidrug resistant uropathogenic Escherichia coli biofilm
Literature.Author: Moazzezy N, Karam MRA, Rafati S, Bouzari S, Oloomi M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli CFT073(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli UTI89(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=125-250µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=125µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=125µg/ml)
